com.semartinez.projects.choppit.view

Class StepRecyclerAdapter.EditStepViewHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • com.semartinez.projects.choppit.view.StepRecyclerAdapter.EditStepViewHolder
  • Enclosing class:
    StepRecyclerAdapter

    public class StepRecyclerAdapter.EditStepViewHolder
extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    The ViewHolder class attaches Step fields to UI components. EditStepViewHolder presents user-editable Steps.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind(Step step)
      This method attaches a specific Step to a specific entry in the active Fragment and attaches a reference to the EditingFragment to handle user input.
